name: Song of Morus
description:
##You need Looking Glass Portrait to play this game##
This game is designed exclusively for Looking Glass Portrait display in Desktop mode. Launching it without the display will only show confusing color pattern. (I may release a non hologram display version in the future) Please learn about it in : https://lookingglassfactory.com/portrait

Description
Song of Morus is an experimental mini game for me to test the new released hologram display, Looking Glass Portrait. It's a classic top view shoot-em up game but integrated the y-axis. The theme is based on Jiangshi fiction movies from Hong Kong, but anime character design.  Currently it's just a small game with only one level as  proof of concept, but if it attract enough amount of attention, it will be my honour to keep developing it.

Please be noticed that. This game is Looking Glass exclusive. It was not my original plan. But during the development, i find that the stereopsis vision is far more important than I expected, it's very difficult to feel the bullets' 3d position on a normal screen.  So, please find a Looking Glass.

Gameplay
Shoot the enemy until she's dead, easy.
Collect orbs on ground and push Z to trigger special power

Control
Move - Arrow keys
Float - Spacebar
Special - Key Z
